item.title: physics635
item.description: Laser Spectroscopy - physics635 Course Laser Spectroscopy Course No. physics635 Category Type Language Teaching hours CP Semester Elective Lecture with exercises English 3+1 6 ST Requirements: Preparation: Form of Testing and Examination: Requirements for the examination (written): successful work with the exercises Length of Course: 1 semester Aims of the Course: Make the students understand the principles of spectroscopy and enable them to practically apply their knowledge in research and development.
